reviews.description: Purchased my Honda Civic from this showroom — the staff was professional, paperwork was smooth, and delivery was on time.
Bought a Toyota Axio last month. The car is in great condition, and they offered a fair price. Highly recommended!
Nice collection of reconditioned cars. However, the loan approval process took a bit longer than expected.
Bought a used Toyota Premio — very clean interior and well-maintained. Totally worth the price.
The team helped me choose the perfect car within my budget. Transparent pricing and honest advice.
Car delivery was delayed by a day, but the condition was exactly as described. Communication could be better.
Bought a Nissan X-Trail — runs perfectly! The detailing and inspection process were very professional.
Test drive was smooth, and the staff was polite. Could improve parking and waiting area for customers.
Purchased a hybrid car — they explained all the details clearly. Very trustworthy dealership.
The car is in good shape, but the paperwork took longer than I expected. Overall a good experience though.
